segments.text: I see the open window and the calm garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a peaceful view compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so relaxed, even though her kitchen is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s enjoying the sunlight too much to notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever look up from that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, but she doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t ruin the cabinets with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so tidy and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step through that window and leave this mess behind.
segments.speaker: PAR
